content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest (position x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0), a Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0), a Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0), a Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0), a Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0), a Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0), and a Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), a Boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an Offshore Pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to drop items into it
### Errors when no input liquid
- Ensure there is input liquid before attempting to use the Steam Engine
### Errors when no fluid present in connections
- Ensure there is fluid present in connections before attempting to use the Steam Engine
### Errors when out of fuel
- Ensure the Boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt before attempting to use the Furnace
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine
### Errors when no research in progress
- Ensure there is research in progress before attempting to use the Lab
